Ètvrtá kapitola se zabıvá formulací testovacích pøípadù vyuívajících technologie umìlé inteligence pro danou aplikaci. Pátá kapitola doplòuje testovací pøípady a automatizuje je pomocí nástroje Testim.IO. Následnì je provedeno hodnocení stability testù v prùbìhu urèitého èasového období.

titleEN: Development and implementation of Executive Cockpit Dashboard template for KPI monitoring
titleCZ: Vıvoj a implementace šablony Executive Cockpit Dashboardu pro monitorování KPI
KeywordsEN: KPI; dashboard; Microsoft Power BI; Business Intelligence
KeywordsCZ: dashboard; Microsoft Power BI; KPI; Business Intelligence
AbstractEN: The main goal of this bachelor’s thesis is to create an effective and user-friendly tool for managers to monitor key performance indicators and make data-driven decisions. To achieve the main goal, several additional goals were set. The first additional goal was the implementation of the template itself in Microsoft Power BI, designed to be easy to use and customizable for different types of companies. The second goal involved creating recommendations and alerts based on KPI analysis. The third goal included testing the usability of the dashboards using the System Usability Scale method. The final goal was to identify potential challenges associated with the implementation of the dashboard. All stated goals were achieved through a combination of sources research, theoretical knowledge gained during the study and the author’s practical experience. The result of the bachelor thesis is a dashboard template developed according to the documentation available on the MBI and MBI-AF portals.
AbstractCZ: Hlavním cílem bakaláøské práce je vytvoøit efektivní a uivatelsky pøívìtivı nástroj pro manaery k monitorování KPI a rozhodování na základì dat. Vıslednım nástrojem je dashboard, jen je snadno pouitelnı a vhodnı pro rùzné typy podnikù. K dosaení hlavního cíle bylo stanoveno nìkolik dílèích cílù.  Prvním z nich byla implementace samotné šablony v nástroji Microsoft Power BI, navrené tak, aby byla snadno pouitelná a pøizpùsobitelná pro rùzné typy podnikù. Druhı cíl zahrnoval vytvoøení doporuèení a varování na základì analızy KPI. Tøetí cíl se tıkal testování pouitelnosti dashboardu, které bylo provedeno pomocí metody System Usability Scale. Posledním cílem bylo identifikovat potenciální pøekáky a vızvy spojené s implementací dashboardu. Stanovenıch cílù bylo dosaeno díky kombinaci rešerše zdrojù, teoretickıch znalosti získanıch bìhem studia a praktickıch zkušeností autorky. Vısledkem bakaláøské práce je šablona dashboardu, vyvinutá dle dokumentace dostupné na portálech MBI a MBI-AF.

titleEN: Development of web applications using React.js and TypeScript
titleCZ: Vıvoj webovıch aplikací pomocí React.js a TypeScript
KeywordsEN: React.js; TypeScript; web applications development; JavaScript; library; Single-page  aplication
KeywordsCZ: React.js; TypeScript; vıvoj webovıch aplikací; JavaScript; knihovna; Single-page aplikace
AbstractEN: The bachelor thesis focuses on developing web applications with React.js, one of the most  popular JavaScript libraries, and TypeScript technologies. With the growing importance of  the internet, finding an efficient way, how to create web applications considering various  browsers and devices, is becoming more critical. Library React.js, complemented by  TypeScript, provides developers with a modern and effective environment for creating  interactive Single-page web applications. The first part of the thesis focuses on introducing React.js technology and describes its  fundamental syntax, features, and development principles. Furthermore, it explores the  programming language TypeScript used for enhancing type security and code readability.  The integration of React.js with TypeScript with its advantages is also presented. The  advantages of using React.js for web development are discussed compared to other  technologies, particularly its main competitors, Vue.js and Angular. The second part of the thesis presents a practical case study of developing a web application  using React.js and TypeScript. It outlines the process of creating the application using a Waterfall model with all its parts, including implementing key features, and notifying  problems that may arise during development. The web application serves as a Traveler’s journal, allowing users to create places they have visited, a map indicating their locations,  and add particular landmarks worth visiting. Additionally, there is a checklist of things not  to forget when traveling. In the conclusion, the thesis discusses the findings and evaluates the application and the  work itself. It is also judged whether the goals of the work were accomplished.

titleEN: Analysis and design of a BI solution for a company providing installation services
titleCZ: Analıza a návrh BI øešení firmy poskytující montání sluby
KeywordsEN: business intelligence; analysis; dashboard; SSBI; service; report
KeywordsCZ: analıza; business intelligence; dashboard; SSBI; servis; report
AbstractEN: The bachelor thesis deals with the analysis and design of a BI solution for a company providing installation and maintenance of boilers. The solution is created for AGA PLYNSERVIS s.r.o. The main objective of the thesis is to create an analytical application that will help the company to improve management and decision making. The main objective is divided into four sub-objectives where the first one focuses on defining the installation services industry, the second one focuses on analysing the selected company to identify BI needs and requirements, the third one focuses on dimensional modelling where a rough dimensional model and physical data model are created, and the last one focuses on designing a BI application where dashboards and reports are created. To achieve the objectives, methods such as analysis of company and internet resources, comparisons and strategic analysis, including Porter&apos;s five forces model, financial analysis and SWOT analysis are used. To gain a deeper understanding of the needs of the company, guided interviews with the owner of the company were essential. The main contributions of the thesis include the created dashboards, which will allow the company to better monitor and optimize costs, performance and support decision-making. Other contributions are the outputs of the analyses that reveal the strengths and weaknesses of the company.

The main objective of this thesis is to suggest a Business Intelligence solution that effectively meets the needs of the company, facilitates monitoring of key indicators, and decision-making processes. In order to achieve this goal, information obtained from the company and publicly available sources was used. The theoretical part of the thesis characterizes the insurance market, basic concepts, and its current state. After that, the company ÈSOB Pojišovací makléø, s.r.o. and its scope of business are introduced. The practical part focuses on the design of a BI solution that corresponds to the current needs of the company. Finally, this solution is transformed into a pilot application using the Power BI tool.

titleEN: Analysis and design of BI solution for a management of an organizational unit in a financial corporation
titleCZ: Analıza a návrh BI øešení pro øízení organizaèního útvaru finanèní korporace
KeywordsEN: Agile; Business intelligence; project management; Power BI; people management; dashboard

AbstractEN: The bachelor thesis deals with managing projects and people in an IT environment, and how to effectively use Power BI for this purpose. The aim of the thesis is to improve people and project management in an organizational unit of an unnamed financial corporation. Readers are first introduced to the area of project management, people management methodologies and the area of self-service business intelligence tools. The key problems were identified based on an analysis of the organizational unit under study, which was conducted using the observation method and the semi-structured interview method. These are mainly in overview and assignment of employees to agile units and in the area of work reporting done by employees. As managers need to have awareness of these areas, a BI solution of these problems was proposed. The result of the work is a five-page Dashboard that allows executives and managers to make better decisions and helps them with awareness.

titleEN: Analysis and design of Business Intelligence solution for entrepreneur in hospitality
titleCZ: Analıza a návrh Business Intelligence øešení pro podnikatele v pohostinství
KeywordsEN: Analysis; Business Intelligence; Restaurant; Management
KeywordsCZ: Business Intelligence; Analıza; Øízení; Restaurace
AbstractEN: The main aim of the bachelor thesis is to create Self-Service Business Intelligence solution for a company operating in the hospitality industry.  The first part of the work analyses the hospitality sector. The work monitors the historical development of the industry and a more detailed description of the current state, including research into the types of business concepts in the market. Subsequently, the hospitality industry is analysed from several macroeconomic indicators, specifically from the GDP, employment, and inflation perspective. The next part of the work focuses on managing hospitality business operations. The areas of business management are defined, and key tasks are presented within each area. The work continues with the introduction of roles within the organizational structure of the business and, finally, documents that are essential for the operation of the business or that arise during operation. The last part of the work is the actual Self-Service Business Intelligence solution for the entrepreneur in the hospitality industry. The solution precedes its design by defining dimensions and indicators and modelling them in a multidimensional model. The expected outcome will primarily help the company owner for whom the SSBI solution is created. However, the work can also serve other entrepreneurs in this industry as a basis for creating SSBI solutions in their business. It is also for those interested in Business Intelligence.

titleEN: Analysis and design of Business Intelligence solution for the shopping center
titleCZ: Analıza a návrh øešení Business intelligence pro obchodní centrum
KeywordsEN: shopping center; Business Intelligence; business management; analysis
KeywordsCZ: podnikové øízení; analıza; Business Intelligence; obchodní centrum
AbstractEN: The bachelor thesis focuses on a comprehensive analysis of the UKRAINE shopping center and on designing a BI solution to improve decision-making processes in the company. To achieve the main objectives of the thesis, it was divided into three parts. The first part deals with the analysis of the retail sector in Ukraine, where the historical development, the current state of the market and the specifics of regional shopping centers were examined. The given analysis helped to identify the key needs and preferences of visitors, which is important for planning shopping center strategies. The second part focused on a specific shopping center, its organizational structure, corporate governance, and the current problems faced by the center. The third part of the work focused on the design and implementation of a BI application, which included the creation of a dimensional model and dashboards to support decision making. The output of this thesis is an analytical application that was developed in Microsoft Power BI tool. The application was successfully put into operation and enabled to streamline the decision-making processes of the UKRAINE shopping center.

Pro dosaení hlavního cíle byla práce rozdìlena do tøí dílèích cílù. První dílèí cíl se zabıvá analızou maloobchodního sektoru na Ukrajinì, kde byl zkoumán historickı vıvoj, souèasnı stav trhu a specifika regionálních obchodních center. Daná analıza pomohla identifikovat klíèové potøeby a preference návštìvníkù, co je dùleité pro plánování strategií obchodních center. Druhı cíl se soustøedil na konkrétní obchodní centrum, jeho organizaèní strukturu, podnikové øízení a aktuální problémy, se kterımi se centrum potıká. titleEN: Analysis of sports apps for amateur athletes
titleCZ: Analıza športovıch aplikácií pre amatérskych športovcov
KeywordsEN: Smartphone; The mobile sports application; Comparison
KeywordsCZ: Mobilné športové aplikácie; Smartfón; Komparácia
AbstractEN: The main goal of the bachelor thesis is comparison and subsequent evaluation of mobile applications which are primarily intended to measure sports Activity. The thesis is divided into two parts. The first part deals with introducing the reader to the topic of mobile applications. Following, the thesis deals with the possible usage of mobile applications in the professional and amateur sports industry. In the third chapter of theoretical part, the reader learns what apps are currently available in the sports app market, basic features they offer and the trends that are future of these apps. The second part, which is the main part of this thesis, presents a comparison of apps selected, according to the criteria that are described in this section, too. The output of the bachelor thesis is an evaluation of the applications and a summary of recommendations based on their comparison.

titleEN: Application for Retrieving and Scoring Data from Real Estate Servers
titleCZ: Aplikace pro získávání a hodnocení dat z realitních serverù
KeywordsEN: real estate market; real estate listings; scoring; real estate scoring; Scrapy; web scraping
KeywordsCZ: web scraping; scoring; hodnocení nemovitostí; Scrapy; realitní inzeráty; realitní trh
AbstractEN: This bachelor’s thesis focuses on designing and implementing an application for retrieving and scoring real estate listings from selected Czech real estate servers. This project aimed to create a system that periodically collects, stores, and analyses data from real estate listings. Based on their content and defined user preferences, the application numerically scores, sorts, and informs the user about the listings. Sreality and Bezrealitky have been chosen as the real estate platforms used for data acquisition. Various methods and approaches were used in this thesis, including prototyping, the weighted sum method to score the listings, or web scraping, used to extract web data using the Scrapy framework in the Python programming language. The scored listings are delivered to the user through notifications on the Discord communication platform and through a simple web application created using the Flask framework. The results show that the system can efficiently collect data from real estate listings, which allows users to easily compare listings based on the calculated ratings. The author also identifies specific features that could extend the existing functionality and discusses issues related to limitations imposed by real estate platforms.

Cílem práce bylo vytvoøit systém, kterı periodicky sbírá, ukládá a analyzuje data z realitních inzerátù. Aplikace získané inzeráty na základì jejich obsahu a definovanıch uivatelskıch preferencí èíselnì ohodnotí, seøadí a informuje o nich uivatele. V práci dochází k pouití rùznıch metod a pøístupù, vèetnì prototypování, metody váeného souètu pro vıpoèet hodnocení nebo web scrapingu, slouícího k získání webovıch dat za pouití Scrapy frameworku v programovacím jazyce Python. Ohodnocené inzeráty aplikace zprostøedkovává formou notifikace uivatele na komunikaèní platformì Discord a také prostøednictvím jednoduché webové aplikace, vytvoøené pomocí Flask frameworku. Vısledky ukazují, e je systém schopen efektivnì sbírat data z realitních inzerátù, na základì kterıch uivatelùm umoòuje inzeráty díky hodnocení jednoduše porovnat. titleEN: Automation of the Release Process in the Context of Liferay DXP Technology
titleCZ: Automatizace release procesu v kontextu technologie Liferay DXP
KeywordsEN: Liferay; release; CI/CD; DevOps; analysis; deployment; Docker; Git; GitHub Actions
KeywordsCZ: analıza; CI/CD; DevOps; deployment; GitHub Actions; Liferay; release; Docker; Git
AbstractEN: Bachelor thesis addresses the release process within the company Lundegaard a.s., particularly in relation to projects built on content management system Liferay. The main objective of this thesis is to provide client-friendly and operationally efficient methods for building and deploying Liferay applications. The results of this thesis were consulted with various stakeholders, both within Lundegaard and with interested parties from the customer side. Thesis briefly introduces underlying terminology, especially in relation to the DevOps and CI/CD concepts. This introduction, analysis of the technical aspects of the Liferay technology and review of the current practices in operating solution in question led to the positing of analytical conclusions, highlighting weaknesses and potential resolutions. Based on these conclusions, a conceptual dataflow proposition for an adjusted process was developed, which was discussed with Lundegaard&apos;s client. Feedback received was utilized in preparing a prototype utilizing the GitHub Actions service. Finally, the thesis summarizes important implementation notes and possibilities for further system development.

Hlavním cílem práce je poskytnout klientsky a provoznì pøívìtivìjší zpùsob sestavení a nasazení Liferay aplikace, vıstupy práce byly konzultovány s rùznımi stakeholdery jak u firmy Lundegaard, tak u jejich odbìratele. Práce struènì pøedstavuje základní terminologii, zejména v souvislosti s pojmy DevOps a CI/CD. Na základì tohoto vymezení, analızy technickıch aspektù technologie Liferay a inspekce souèasnıch zvyklostí v provozu dodávanıch øešení byly pøedstaveny analytické závìry, poukazující na slabá místa a monosti jejich øešení. Na základì tìchto závìrù byl sestaven koncept dataflow upraveného procesu, kterı byl prodiskutován s Klientem firmy Lundegaard a dle zpìtné vazby došlo k pøípravì prototypu vyuívající sluby GitHub Actions. V práci jsou na závìr shrnuty dùleité implementaèní poznámky a monosti dalšího rozvoje.

titleEN: Digital literacy in secondary schools in the Czech Republic
titleCZ: Digitální gramotnost na støedních školách v ÈR
KeywordsEN: digital literacy; secondary schools; educational system; comparative analysis; Czech Republic
KeywordsCZ: vzdìlávací systém; støední školy; srovnávací analıza; Èeská republika; digitální gramotnost
AbstractEN: Bachelor&apos;s thesis focuses on assessing the level of digital literacy among secondary school students in the Czech Republic. Using a quantitative method of a knowledge test, the work analyses the digital competencies of students from various types of secondary schools and compares them concerning the years of study. The theoretical part defines and elaborates on the concept of literacy, emphasising digital literacy, including an overview of programs measuring various types of literacy applied in the Czech educational system. Furthermore, the integration of digital literacy into school curricula is examined, both from a historical perspective and in light of current educational trends in the European Union and the Czech Republic. The practical part of the thesis presents research that methodologically follows the theoretical frameworks outlined and examines the digital competencies of students from different types of secondary schools. The research was conducted through a test, the results of which were analysed to compare digital skills between grammar school students, students of vocational schools, apprenticeships, and students of various grades. In conclusion, the author of the thesis comments on the findings in relation to the research.
AbstractCZ: Bakaláøská práce se zamìøuje na hodnocení úrovnì digitální gramotnosti studentù støedních škol v Èeské republice. titleEN: Interpretation of conjunction in large language models
titleCZ: Interpretace konjunkce ve velkıch jazykovıch modelech
KeywordsEN: conjunction; representativeness heuristic; conjunction fallacy; ChatGPT; Microsoft Copilot; Gemini; Llama 2; large language models
KeywordsCZ: velké jazykové modely; konjunkce; reprezentativní heuristika; klam konjunkce; ChatGPT; Microsoft Copilot; Gemini; Llama 2
AbstractEN: This bachelor thesis is devoted to the interpretation of conjunction in large language models (specifically GPT 3.5, GPT 4, Gemini a Llama 2), focusing on conjunction in the context of cognitive biases and the different meanings of conjunction across fields. The thesis should clarify in the field of artificial intelligence and natural language processing, how large language models behave in relation to conjunction and the cognitive biases that are associated with conjunction. The first part of the thesis describes different understandings of conjunction from the perspective of different fields. Next, the paper introduces the issue of large language models. The thesis then focuses on describing previous studies, which then form the basis for the second, practical part. Here it is tested, using prompts, whether models are subject to the conjunction fallacy and the influence of the representational heuristic. Furthermore, by hiding parts of the text behind meaningless identifiers, in various forms of prompts, the thesis attempts to achieve better results in tests of the representational heuristic and the conjunction fallacy. Furthermore, we investigate whether the choice of conjunction used in a possible conjunction answer affects the number of correct model answers. Finally, the thesis tests the effect of using different conjunctions on the translation into predicate logic symbols. The results are then subjected to hypothesis testing, specifically Fisher&apos;s exact test. Tests have shown that large language models can interpret conjunction better when translated from natural language to predicate logic symbols if it is represented by a simpler conjunction. In terms of cognitive biases and the probability rule for conjunction, the models do not perform well. The models are subject to the influence of the representational heuristic and the conjunction fallacy. The number of correct model responses (for the representational heuristic and the conjunction fallacy) improved after hiding the parts of the text that the model responses suggested caused cognitive bias behind meaningless identifiers. Changing the conjunction (for a simpler one) in the possible answer of assignment did not result in a significant improvement based on the tests.
AbstractCZ: Tato bakaláøská práce je vìnována interpretaci konjunkce ve velkıch jazykovıch modelech (konkrétnì GPT 3.5, GPT 4, Gemini a Llama 2) se zamìøením na konjunkci v kontextu kognitivních zkreslení a rùznıch vıznamù konjunkce napøíè obory. Mìla by v oboru umìlé inteligence a zpracování pøirozeného jazyka více objasnit, jak se velké jazykové modely chovají ve vztahu ke konjunkci a kognitivním zkreslením s konjunkcí spojenıch. První èást bakaláøské práce popisuje odlišná chápání konjunkce z hlediska rùznıch oborù. Dále práce pøedstavuje problematiku velkıch jazykovıch modelù. Následnì se práce zamìøuje na popsání pøedchozích studií, z nich potom vychází druhá, praktická èást. Zde je testováno pomocí promptù, zda modely podléhají klamu konjunkce a vlivu reprezentativní heuristiky. Dále se v práci pomocí skrıvání èástí textu za bezvıznamové identifikátory, v rùznıch podobách zadání, pokoušíme docílit lepších vısledkù v testech reprezentativní heuristiky a klamu konjunkce. Jako další zkoumáme, zda vıbìr spojky pouité v moné odpovìdi s konjunkcí má vliv na poèet správnıch odpovìdí modelù. Nakonec se práce zabıvá testováním vlivu pouití rùznıch spojek v souvìtí na pøeklad do symbolù predikátové logiky. Následnì jsou vısledky testù podrobeny testování hypotéz, konkrétnì Fisherovu exaktnímu testu. Testy ukázaly, e velké jazykové modely dokáou pøi pøekladu z pøirozeného jazyka do symbolù predikátové logiky interpretovat konjunkci lépe, pokud je znázornìna jednodušší spojkou. Z hlediska kognitivních zkreslení a pravidla pravdìpodobnosti pro konjunkci si modely nevedou dobøe. Modely podléhají vlivu reprezentativní heuristiky a klamu konjunkce. Poèet správnıch odpovìdí modelù (u reprezentativní heuristiky a klamu konjunkce) se zlepšil po skrytí èástí textu, které podle odpovìdí modelu zpùsobovaly kognitivní zaujetí, za bezvıznamové identifikátory. Zmìnou spojky (za jednodušší) v moné odpovìdi zadání nebylo na základì testù dosaeno signifikantního zlepšení.

titleEN: Strojové uèení pomocí knihoven Qiskit a squlearn
titleCZ: Machine learning using libraries Qiskit and squlearn
KeywordsEN: klasické strojové uèení;  Parkinsonova nemoc; kvantové strojové uèení;  qiskit; squlearn; scikit-learn
KeywordsCZ: quantum machine learning; classical machine learning; Parkinson’s disease; qiskit; squlearn; scikit-learn
AbstractEN: Bakaláøská práce se zabıvá vyuitím a porovnáním kvantovıch a klasickıch technik strojo- vého uèení, konkrétnì se zamìøuje na klasifikaèní úlohy pro diagnostiku Parkinsonovy choroby s vyuitím souèasnıch frameworkù, jako jsou qiskit a squlearn pro kvantové strojové uèení a scikit-learn pro klasické pøístupy. Studie posuzuje, jak tyto technologie zvládají a analyzují datové soubory. Cílem je provést podrobnı pøehled a srovnání kvantovıch algoritmù oproti klasickım metodám se zamìøením na jejich vıkonnost v klasifikaèních úlohách, konkrétnì s ohledem na evaluaèní metriky jako jsou pøesnost, úplnost a F1-skóre. Práce je strukturována do rùznıch etap, poèínaje teoretickım úvodem do kvantového strojového uèení, následova- nım pøedzpracováním dat a vıbìrem pøíznakù pomocí vzájemné informace a implementací a hodnocením jak u klasifikátoru s podpùrnımi vektory, tak jeho kvantového ekvivalentu, QSVC algoritmu. Tyto modely jsou testovány na dvou datovıch sadách a jejich vısledky jsou porovnávány s pøedchozími vızkumy. Práci uzavírá diskuse o srovnávacích vısledcích, kontrolní test s vyuitím datové sady &quot;Oxford Parkinson’s disease detection dataset&quot;a zkou- mání dùleitıch atributù a jejich vlivu na prediktivní vıkonnost modelù.
AbstractCZ: The bachelor thesis deals with the use and comparison of quantum and classical machine learning techniques, specifically focusing on classification tasks for the diagnosis of Parkinson’s disease. Using current frameworks such as qiskit and squlearn for quantum machine learning and scikit-learn for classical approaches. The study assesses how these technologies handle and analyze datasets. The aim is to perform a detailed review and comparison of quantum algorithms versus classical methods, focusing on their performance in classification tasks, specifically with respect to evaluation metrics such as precision, recall and F1-score. The work is structured in different stages, starting with a theoretical introduction to quantum machine learning, followed by data preprocessing and feature selection using mutual information, and the implementation and evaluation of both the support vector machine classifier and its quantum equivalent, the QSVC algorithm. These models are tested on two datasets and the results are compared with previous research. The paper concludes with a discussion of the comparative results, a control test using the Oxford Parkinson’s disease detection dataset, and an examination of the important attributes and their effect on the predictive performance of the models.

AbstractEN: This bachelor thesis solves the problematics of developing a mobile application with the functionality of medicine reminders. The output of this thesis is an application prototype and with the use of a survey it is found that it has a positive impact on dealing with forgetting to take medicine.

titleEN: Design and Implementation of an Application for Employee Pick-ups Planning
titleCZ: Návrh a implementace aplikace pro plánování svozu zamìstnancù
KeywordsEN: React; business analysis; MMSP; Spring Boot; UML; software development
KeywordsCZ: Spring Boot; UML; byznys analıza; vıvoj softwaru; MMSP; React
AbstractEN: The main objective of this bachelor thesis is to analyze the restaurant&apos;s business and based on the discovered facts, to design and implement a prototype application that will support the process of planning employee pick-ups in the restaurant. The author of the thesis is employed in the management of the examined restaurant. The motivation for the topic is the lack of application support for a particular business process, which causes problems in the restaurant&apos;s operation.  The main objective of the thesis is decomposed into five sub-objectives. The first sub-objective is to analyze the problem area of employee pick-ups at the examined restaurant. Based on the findings, the second sub-objective, the determination of the application development methodology, is established. The MMSP methodology was selected and adapted for the development. The third sub-objective is the collection and analysis of the application requirements. The requirements are managed, completed, and specified in a requirements catalog. The fourth sub-objective is the selection of technologies and the design of the solutions. The fifth sub-objective is the actual implementation of the prototype and its evaluation. The methods used in this thesis include literature and internet resources research, observation, questioning, analysis, synthesis, and abstraction. The result of the work is a working prototype that is positively evaluated by the stakeholders. The thesis is then a documentation of the entire analysis and development process. Selected disciplines and tasks from the MMSP methodology are performed and recorded in the thesis. The thesis&apos;s contribution consists of application support for the problematic business process.
AbstractCZ: Hlavním cílem této bakaláøské práce je zanalyzovat byznys zkoumané restaurace a na základì zjištìnıch skuteèností pak navrhnout a implementovat prototyp aplikace, která bude v dané restauraci podporovat proces plánování svozu zamìstnancù. titleEN: Comparison of the ICT Usage in Secondary Schools in South Bohemia and Upper Austria
titleCZ: Porovnání vyuití  ICT na støedních školách v jiních Èechách a Horním Rakousku
KeywordsEN: school information system; ICT; secondary school; e-learning
KeywordsCZ: ICT; školní informaèní systém; e-learning; støední škola
AbstractEN: The aim of this thesis is to determine and analyse the extent of the use of available ICT solutions in the operation of secondary schools in the South Bohemia Region, and to make a basic comparison with secondary schools in neighbouring Upper Austria. Methods such as questionnaire survey, guided interviews, comparison of results or personal observation are used in the practical part. The thesis is divided into two main parts. In the first part, concepts related to the topic of the thesis, i.e. information and communication technology, school information system and e-learning, are theoretically described. This is followed by an analysis of the components of e-learning and school information systems, including a description of the current state of the art. In addition, it is possible to find current legislation and conceptual strategies related to ICT in teaching and school operation. The second part of the thesis is practical, in which we conduct research on the use of ICT in secondary schools. Through the research conducted, it is found that the level of use of ICT resources is at a similar level in schools in both regions. At the end, the research results and limitations of this work are discussed in detail.
AbstractCZ: Cílem této práce je zjistit a analyzovat míru vyuití dostupnıch ICT øešení v provozu støedních škol v Jihoèeském kraji, a udìlat základní porovnání se støedními školami v sousedícím Horním Rakousku. titleEN: Predicting the rating of scientific papers
titleCZ: Predikce hodnocení vìdeckıch prací

AbstractEN: This bachelor thesis deals with the prediction of scientific publication ratings using machine learning methods. The main aim of this bachelor thesis is to find out what success can be achieved in predicting the peer review ratings of scientific publications. A search of studies dealing with the prediction of scientific publication reviews is conducted to achieve the main objective. Software tools and libraries for applying machine learning methods are described. Data collection and description of datasets are also described. Evaluation metrics for assessing model performance are also described, as well as machine learning methods. In the experimental part, traditional machine learning methods such as logistic regression, linear regression, decision trees, the AutoGluon-Tabular interface, and the SciBERT language model are applied. Then, the results of the models from the experimental part are compared.

titleEN: The influence of social networks on the communication of study materials

AbstractEN: The bachelor thesis focuses on social networks and their influence on university student’s studies. The aim of the final thesis is to find out how students of the Faculty of Informatics and Statistics of the Prague University of Economics and Business prepare for exams, especially to what extent they use social networks for their preparation. The partial goal is to further analyse pros and cons of shared study materials from social networks.  For an overall view of the investigated issue, the theoretical part includes the history and present of social networks, then the possibilities of its use in the studies of students of the Faculty of Informatics and Statistics. In the practical part a questionnaire survey is carried out to obtain information regarding the use of shared study materials from social networks by students. This is followed by quided interviews to provide a deeper insight into the problem. The author then compares the results between two groups of students divided by year of study with his own observations, where answers to research question are then provided to help meet the set goals.

titleEN: The Impact of Social Media on the Mental Health of Young People
titleCZ: Vliv sociálních sítí na mentální zdraví mladıch lidí
KeywordsEN: social media consumption; influence of social media; social networks; mental health
KeywordsCZ: vliv sociálních sítí; konzumace sociálních sítí; sociální sítì; mentální zdraví
AbstractEN: The presented bachelor&apos;s thesis focuses on examining the influence of social networks on the mental health of young people. With the increase in the use of social networks among the young population, the need to understand the effects of these platforms on the psychological state and well-being of individuals becomes more urgent. The aim of the bachelor&apos;s thesis is to find out what concrete effects the long-term use of social networks has on the mental health of young people and to find out whether young people actively try to limit their screen time. The work deals with the analysis of various aspects, including content consumption, online interaction through social networks and the psychological consequences of such behaviour. To achieve the goal, a questionnaire survey methodology was chosen, which included a random selection of respondents aged 14-30 and a case study comparing 2 close friends. The case study focuses on the impact of social media on their work/school life.

titleEN: The use of ICT in teaching in elementary schools, including special elementary schools
titleCZ: Vyuití  ICT ve vıuce na základních školách, s pøihlédnutím na speciální základní školy
KeywordsEN: English language teaching; elementary schools; ICT in education; Interactive whiteboards; special elementary schools; primary schools

AbstractEN: This bachelor thesis focuses on the utilization of interactive whiteboards in English language teaching at primary schools, with consideration for special primary schools. The aim of the thesis is to describe how these technologies impact the educational process and how they are integrated into daily teaching. The theoretical section provides an overview of interactive whiteboards, their functionalities, and their potential to enhance student engagement. Furthermore, the thesis analyses various pedagogical approaches and methods that teachers employ to effectively incorporate these tools into teaching. The practical section presents the evaluation of data obtained from questionnaires administered to English language teachers at the primary stage of Prague elementary schools, including those from special primary schools. This illustrates how teachers perceive interactive whiteboards in English language teaching the primary stage of elementary schools.

titleEN: Usage of ICT in education - comparison between the first and second grades of primary schools
titleCZ: Vyuití ICT ve vıuce - porovnání prvního a druhého stupnì základních škol
KeywordsEN: mathematics; computer science; pupil with SEN; pupils; Information and communication technologies; ICT in primary schools; teaching hours; English language; special educational needs
KeywordsCZ: Informaèní a komunikaèní technologie; informatika; speciální vzdìlávací potøeby; ák se SVP; ICT na základních školách; áci; vyuèovací hodiny; anglickı jazyk; matematika
AbstractEN: The bachelor thesis focuses on the usage of information and communication technologies (ICT) in primary and secondary grades, comparing them in subjects such as mathematics, English language and computer science. The primary aim is to compare ICT usage between primary and secondary grades, taking into account students with special educational needs. Additionally, it aims to map and analyze the use of digital devices in the final years of both, including interactive whiteboards, laptops, computers, tablets, mobile phones, etc., with a focus on students with special educational needs who may use ICT beyond regular instructions. A questionnaire survey conducted at four elementary schools in Prague provides data from both pupils and teachers, who expressed their opinions on the type of device used, frequency of usage  and sometimes the manner of use. Interactive whiteboards are the most commonly used (across all researched schools) with younger pupils actively engaging with them, while older pupils primarily use them as projection screens. Additionally mobile phones and tablets are frequently integrated into lessons at the primary grade, while computers are used more at the secondary grade. Pupils with special educational needs use mobile devices for translations, simplifying tasks in lessons as well as for games primarily aimed at practice and revision. Supplemented and expanded by structural interviews, the findings suggest that ICT is an integral part of classroom teaching, enriching and motivating pupils.

AbstractEN: This bachelor thesis is devoted to finding out the use of XR in different industries and the development of the methods used. In the first part of the thesis, a literature search was conducted, and terms related to XR were defined. Subsequently, the development and possible methods of use of these systems were described. In the second part, a quantitative questionnaire survey was conducted to answer twenty-one sub-research questions related to the level of XR usage in different industries, one part of the questionnaire was based on previous studies and the other part was a standardized SUS (System Usability Scale) questionnaire. A total of 52 respondents from companies using XR in their processes completed the questionnaire. The results showed that most respondents responded positively to the use of XR in the companies&apos; processes. Given the rapidly evolving market, it is important for companies to focus on further development and research into methods of using XR.

AbstractEN: The thesis is focused on the card game Bang! from the perspective of game theory. It aims to discover the impact of tactical and strategic decisions, made by the various roles, on the chances of winning and discovering a combination most resembling an optimal one. The thesis is split into five parts. The first part is purely theoretical, it describes the fundamentals of game theory. In the second part, the various cards and rules of the selected game are described. The third chapter then describes the simulator, used in the process of obtaining data for analysis in the following chapters. Part four tests the feasibility of improving win rates by changing tactics, regardless of the player’s role. The fifth part then pits players with set roles against each other and tests the impact of strategy on their chances of success.

AbstractEN: This bachelor&apos;s thesis is dedicated to the issue of the position and possibilities of social networks in modern times in the field of higher education in the Czech Republic and in Russia. A comprehensive view of this issue is obtained from two main parts of the work - theoretical and practical. In the theoretical part, key terms related to social networks are defined, a historical overview of the most important social networks is described, the special features of their development in both countries and ethical issues related to social networks are presented. In the practical part, research is conducted using the questionnaire survey method, where respondents (originating from both countries) provide information about their experiences with social networks in studying, how it affects their performance and other important aspects related to the researched issue. The aim of this work is to compare the use of social networks by students for studying at universities in the Czech Republic and in Russia using the obtained information. Part of the goal is to answer the fundamental research questions, such as whether the use of social networks in education is similar in the two countries and whether the use of social networks in education impacts academic results. Through the analysis, comparison and interpretation of the obtained data, the author achieved interesting results, which are presented in the respective chapters and summarized in the conclusion.

titleEN: Web application that allows the user to manage and mitigate the risks and threats associated with investing in cryptocurrencies
titleCZ: Webová aplikace umoòující uivateli øídit a sniovat rizika a hrozby spojené s investováním do kryptomìn
KeywordsEN: Laravel; cryptocurrencies; behavioral economics; JavaScript; Nuxt.js; PHP; investments; risk management; TailwindCSS; web application
KeywordsCZ: TailwindCSS; PHP; behaviorální ekonomie; Laravel; JavaScript; Nuxt.js; investice; kryptomìny; webová aplikace; øízení rizik
AbstractEN: The presence of cryptocurrencies cannot be overlooked in recent years. At the time of writing, the price of the largest cryptocurrency – Bitcoin – is once again hitting the million Czech crowns mark. And it is its astronomical price that brings uninformed investors to the market who are unaware of the potential dangers of investing in this type of asset.  This bachelor thesis deals with the risk factors of investing in cryptocurrencies. The aim of the thesis is to create a functional web application to help users manage and reduce the risk factors. The thesis begins with a thorough research that describes the most common risks and discusses cryptocurrency investing through the prism of behavioral science. Next, research is conducted through structured interviews and thematic analysis. The results yield the finding that most investors enter the market impulsively under the weight of fear of missing out and social networks. Based on the research, a web application has been designed and implemented to address the above factors associated with investing and try to minimize their negative impact. The resulting artifact is the source code of a fully functional application implemented in a modern paradigm using the latest programming frameworks Nuxt.js (front-end) and Laravel (back-end). To objectively assess the benefits and potential benefits of this web application, the author conducted extensive qualitative analysis over interviews with its three pilot users.

AbstractEN: Tato bakaláøská práce se zavıvá návrhem SSBI (Self-Service Business Intelligence) øešení pro hodnocení vıkonnosti dodavatelù IT slueb v podnikovém prostøedí. Vızkum zaèíná dùkladnım pøehledem literatury zahrnujícím business intelligence, SSBI a vizualizaci dat, po nìm následuje podrobná analıza souèasnıch metod hodnocení vıkonnosti spoleènosti a role podpùrnıch smluv. AbstractCZ: This bachelor thesis details the design of a Self-Service Business Intelligence (SSBI) solution for assessing the performance of IT service suppliers in a corporate setting. The primary aim is to automate reporting through a Power BI dashboard, which enhances visibility into supplier performance, focusing on adherence to Underpinning Contracts (UCs). The research begins with a thorough literature review encompassing business intelligence, SSBI, and data visualization, followed by a detailed analysis of the company&apos;s current performance assessment methods and the role of underpinning contracts. The development of the dashboard involved close collaboration with company stakeholders and suppliers, prioritizing data accuracy, functionality, and ease of use. The Power BI dashboard was carefully designed to provide a detailed analysis of supplier performance, particularly in relation to incident resolution. Having undergone extensive testing, the dashboard is now actively utilized by key users, offering up-to-date insights, and enhancing decision-making processes regarding supplier management.

AbstractEN: This bachelor&apos;s thesis focuses on the implementation of an online store specializing in clothing sales. The theoretical part of the thesis analyses CMS platforms, introduces the WooCommerce plugin, discusses e-commerce principles, identifies the needs of an online store, and includes a competitive analysis. The practical part of the thesis is divided into three sections, covering design, implementation, and testing. The result of this work is a fully functional e-shop created on the WordPress platform. Among other things, this thesis serves as a useful guide for individuals experienced with the WordPress platform who wish to create their online store.

titleEN: Creation and Prediction of Player Rating
titleCZ: Vytvoøení a predikce ratingu hráèe
KeywordsEN: rating of the player; player rating; data-based rating; FIFA; EA FC; Football Manager; football rating; data handling in football; sports simulators
KeywordsCZ: rating hráèe; hodnocení zaloené na datech; FIFA; EA FC; Football Manager; fotbalovı rating; zacházení s daty ve fotbale; sportovní simulátory; hodnocení hráèe
AbstractEN: The thesis focuses on the creation of an overall player rating based solely on data. This evaluation is then compared to reality and two sports simulators. Data from the FootyStats website related to players from the English Premier League in the 2021/22 season were used for the custom models. Three models were developed for defenders, midfielders, and forwards. Subsequently, a simple predictive model was created to forecast ratings for young players. This comparison revealed that players who achieved the highest ratings in the thesis were also the best in reality and in both simulators. This confirms that both simulators to some extent utilize real data for their evaluations. The discrepancy occurred only for players in the defender position. The defender model differed the most from reality and both gaming simulators because it disproportionately favored players in central defense positions, while full-backs were not as appreciated. Due to their focus on defensive attributes, players on the wing could not compete with those in the center, as wingers also have offensive duties and do not defend as much as those in the center of the field. The model for midfielders and forwards was very accurate in all respects. It would be appropriate to split defenders into models for central and wing defenders. For full-backs, exchanging some defensive rating attributes for offensive ones would be appropriate. Overall, the models are more accurate than anticipated before the start of the thesis. The work can contribute to understanding how ratings are created in those two sports simulators. Subsequently, the thesis demonstrates that handling data and its subsequent evaluation can greatly assist anyone in a professional football environment.
AbstractCZ: Práce se zamìøuje na tvorbu celkového hodnocení hráèe, které je vytvoøeno pouze na základì dat. Toho hodnocení je následnì porovnáno se skuteèností a dvìma sportovními simulátory. Tím je potvrzeno, e oba simulátory do urèité míry vyuívají pro své hodnocení reálná data. Odchylka nastala pouze u hráèù na pozici obránce. Kvùli zamìøení se pøedevším na obranné vlastnosti nemohli hráèi na kraji høištì konkurovat tìm uprostøed, protoe ti na kraji mají i ofenzivní úkoly a nebrání tolik jako ti ve støedu pole. Model pro záloníky a útoèníky byl velice pøesnı ve všech ohledech. Obránce by bylo vhodné rozdìlit do modelù pro støední a krajní obránce. Pro krajní obránce by bylo náleité vymìnit nìkolik obranıch atributù hodnocení za útoèné. Celkovì jsou dané modely pøesnìjší, ne bylo pøed zaèátkem práce pøedpokládáno. Práce mùe pomoci pochopit jakım zpùsobem jsou vytváøena hodnocení v onìch dvou sportovních simulátorech. Následnì práce ukazuje, e zacházení s daty a jejich následné vyhodnocování mùe velmi pomoci komukoliv, kdo se ocitne v profesionálním fotbalovém prostøedí.

Chapter three describes the methodology for developing the solution, which includes six sub-steps. With the help of further sub-steps the solution is implemented. The output of the bachelor thesis is a concrete reporting business intelligence solution.

titleCZ: Vıvoj informaèního systému pro klub intelektuální hry Mafia
KeywordsEN: chatbot; Telegram; development; Django; information system

AbstractEN: The aim of this work is to create an information system specially adapted for the “Mafia” game club in order to optimize its activities and improve the interaction between its members. The work was carried out for further use in the “Enigma” club in Prague. After analyzing the needs of the club, a chatbot in the social network Telegram was created to help club members with various tasks, including tracking their schedule, viewing their statistics, and searching for organizational documents. The Telegram bot also has a notification subscription system. The second part of the information system was the creation of a web application using the Django framework, which is used by Enigma staff to manage the internal life of the club, including archiving games and registering new members. A cloud-based service was chosen to maintain this system, in which a virtual machine was rented. It was then configured for stable and secure operation. The final part of the work was to test the application and assess the prospects for further development of the information system.

titleEN: Flask homework app
titleCZ: Flask aplikace pro domácí úkoly
KeywordsEN: Python; Flask;  application
KeywordsCZ: Flask; aplikace; Python
AbstractEN: This thesis deals with the possibilities of using the Flask framework and applying the acquired knowledge  in practice by creating a small sample application for working with homework. The main goal is to  familiarize the reader with the Flask framework and to create a homework application that can be used for  educational purposes. The main priorities in the development of the application are clarity of the  principles of using its features, lightness and minimalism. The study started with an overview of the basic  technologies that will be used in future work. A brief introduction of Flask and Python was made and a small comparative analysis between them and similar technologies in these areas was performed. The  different phases of application development were discussed in detail, explaining the decisions behind the  choice of one or the other solution, the structure of the application, the database model, the main features  and the user interface. The first place in the development process was to define the main tasks of the  application for the convenience of its use by the potential end user. A critical phase was defining the main  ways of solving the application&apos;s problems to fulfill its main functions so that they could then be scaled  and added to in the event of further development. The development process included the definition and  development of key features that enable the application to work with databases of users and tasks. Testing  of the application was also a separate focus. In general, Flask proved to be an efficient, convenient, and  self-sufficient tool for developing small applications for specific task

titleEN: Klasifikace obrázkù pomocí metod strojového uèení
titleCZ: Image classification using machine learning methods
KeywordsEN: Poèítaèové vidìní; Rozpoznávání obrazu; Klasifikace obrazu; Detekce poškození automobilu
KeywordsCZ: Car damage detection; Computer vision; Image recognition; Image classification
AbstractEN: Nedávné pokroky v oblasti hlubokého uèení zmìnily poèítaèové vidìní, které se vyvinulo z tradièních metod, jako je Support Vector Machines (SVM), na konvoluèní neuronové sítì (CNN) v roce 2012 a nedávno na Vision Transformers (ViT) v roce 2021. Souèasnì tento pokrok dále podpoøilo zlepšení vıpoèetního vıkonu a exponenciální nárùst internetovıch dat. Tato práce vyuívá tohoto vıvoje k vytvoøení modelu poèítaèového vidìní pro klasifikaci poškozenıch a nepoškozenıch automobilù. Konkrétnì studie porovnává pøedtrénované konvoluèní neuronové sítì, jako jsou ResNet a ConvNeXt, s cílem najít pro tuto úlohu nejvıkonnìjší architekturu. Mezi hlavní pøínosy této práce patøí analıza vlivu mnoství a kvality dat na vıkonnost modelu, rovnováha mezi vıpoèetními zdroji a pøesností a zkoumání strategií optimalizace hyperparametrù pro tuto aplikaci. Vıkonnost modelu byla hodnocena pomocí ukazatelù, jako je pøesnost, velikost modelu a skóre F1, pøièem ConvNeXt dosáhl maximální pøesnosti 95,4 %, co dokazuje jeho úèinnost pøi binární klasifikaci pro tuto úlohu. Koneènı model z této studie by mohl bıt pouit na online platformách nebo aukcích pro prodej ojetıch automobilù, co by mohlo zvıšit míru konverze reklamy, zlepšit uivatelskou zkušenost a omezit podvody spojené s prodejem poškozenıch vozidel.
AbstractCZ: Recent advancements in deep learning have changed computer vision, evolving from traditional methods like Support Vector Machines (SVM) to Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) in 2012, and more recently to Vision Transformers (ViT) in 2021. Simultaneously, improvements in computational power and the exponential growth of internet data have further driven this progress. This work uses these developments to build a computer vision model for classifying damaged and undamaged cars. Specifically, the study compares pre-trained convolutional neural networks, such as ResNet and ConvNeXt, to find the best-performing architecture for this task. Key contributions of this work include an analysis of the impact of data quantity and quality on model performance, the balance between computational resources and accuracy, and an exploration of hyperparameter optimization strategies for this application. The model&apos;s performance was evaluated using metrics like accuracy, model size, and F1 score, with ConvNeXt achieving a maximum accuracy of 95.4\%, demonstrating its effectiveness in binary classification for this task. The final model from this study could be applied to online platforms or auctions for selling used cars, potentially enhancing ad conversion rates, improving user experience, and reducing fraud associated with selling damaged vehicles.

titleEN: Application portfolio for event management support

KeywordsCZ: extrakce klíèovıch slov; velké jazykové modely; vyhledávání; vyhledávaèe; webové stránky; web scraping; Python; Selenium
AbstractEN: The aim of this bachelor thesis is to design and build a search engine for competing websites using large language models. It&apos;s main goal is to allow companies to find similar websites to a given URL. The thesis firstly does a research on topics website search, keyword and search engine analysis. Next, it explains in detail what big language models and web scraping are and performs an analysis of their models and tools. Before implementation, functionalities are designed and their possible problems and requirements are analyzed. In the implementation part, the functionalities are programmed and the result is a program that accepts input from a user in the form of a URL and attempts to find similar web pages to the specified web page using web scraping, large language models, Google API and cosine similarity measure. Finally, the program is tested and evaluated.

Jejím hlavním cílem je umonit firmám vyhledat podobné webové stránky k zadané URL adrese. Práce se nejprve zabıvá rešerší webovıch stránek, analıze klíèovıch slov a vyhledávaèù. Dále se podrobnì vysvìtluje, co jsou velké jazykové modely a web scraping, a provede se analıza jejich modelù a nástrojù. Pøed implementací programu se navrhnou funkcionality a zanalyzují se jejich moné problémy a poadavky. V implementaèní èásti se jednotlivé funkcionality naprogramují, pøièem vısledkem práce je program, kterı pøijme vstup od uivatele ve formì URL adresy a pomocí web scrapingu, velkıch jazykovıch modelù, Google API a kosinové míry podobnosti se pokusí vyhledat podobné webové stránky k zadané webové stránce. Na závìr se program otestuje a vyhodnotí.

titleEN: Development of a Library Set for Teaching the Fundamentals of Object-Oriented Architecture
titleCZ: Vytvoøení sady knihoven pro vıuku základù objektové arhitektury
KeywordsEN: Object oriented programming; Software architecture; Programmin education; Python; Karel The Robot; Java
KeywordsCZ: Java; Python; robot Karel; softwarová architektura; objektovì orientované programování; vıuka programování
AbstractEN: The bachelor&apos;s thesis focuses on the development of a library set for teaching the fundamentals of object-oriented architecture using the programming robot Karel. The aim of the thesis is to create tools that enable students to effectively understand the principles of object-oriented programming, such as inheritance, polymorphism, and design patterns. The libraries are implemented in both Java and Python, allowing for broad applicability in educational programs. The work applies modern software architecture principles, such as the SOLID rules and interface design, emphasizing code sustainability and extensibility. The result is a modular solution comprising several library versions, each introducing new features and concepts – from a basic implementation to advanced functionalities such as multi-world support and six- and eight-directional movements. The project contributes not only to programming education but also to the development of software tools for pedagogical purposes. The libraries were tested in a simulated environment to verify their functionality.

Knihovny jsou implementovány v jazycích Java a Python, co umoòuje jejich široké uplatnìní ve vzdìlávacích programech. V práci byly aplikovány moderní principy softwarové architektury, jako jsou SOLID pravidla a návrh rozhraní, èím se zdùrazòuje udritelnost a rozšiøitelnost kódu. Vısledkem je modulární øešení, které zahrnuje nìkolik verzí knihoven, z nich kadá pøedstavuje nové funkce a koncepty – od základní implementace a po pokroèilé funkce, jako je více svìtù a podpora šesti- a osmi-smìrnıch pohybù. Projekt pøináší pøínos nejen v oblasti vıuky programování, ale i ve vıvoji softwarovıch nástrojù pro pedagogické úèely. Knihovny byly testovány v simulovaném prostøedí.

titleEN: Development of note application for Android OS
titleCZ: Vıvoj poznámkové aplikace pro OS Android
KeywordsEN: mobile application; Markdown; notes; Android; Java
KeywordsCZ: Java; Markdown; Android; mobilní aplikace; poznámky
AbstractEN: This bachelor&apos;s thesis focuses on the creation of a mobile application for the Android operating system that will allow users to save, edit and delete simple notes using the Markdown format, color separation and reminders. The first part of the thesis analyzes and compares current note-taking applications according to established criteria, such as ease of use, number of functions, minimum supported version of the Android system and application size. The results of this analysis serve as the basis for the future development of the new application. In the second part, the author sets the requirements for the development of a new application based on the identified needs. The main requirement is support for text formatting using Markdown and color recognition of notes. Furthermore, the ability to export notes and an effort to minimize the size of the application are required. The last part deals with the implementation of a new application with an emphasis on the technologies used, application architecture and testing methods. At the end, there are suggestions for further expansion of the application obtained during development.

První èást práce analyzuje a porovnává souèasné poznámkové aplikace podle stanovenıch kritérií, jako je jednoduchost ovládání, mnoství funkcí, minimální podporovaná verze systému Android a velikost aplikace. Vısledky této analızy slouí jako základ pro budoucí vıvoj nové aplikace. Ve druhé èásti autor stanovuje poadavky na vıvoj nové aplikace na základì zjištìnıch potøeb. Hlavním poadavkem je podpora formátování textu pomocí Markdownu a barevné rozlišení poznámek. Dále je poadována monost exportovat poznámky a snaha o minimalizaci velikosti aplikace. Na závìr jsou uvedeny návrhy na další rozšíøení aplikace získané bìhem vıvoje.
